title: Sponsored: Bouncing Back From Rejection with Actor and Comedian Adam Ferrara
description:
Rejection can be an incredibly demoralizing experience. When we hear “no,” it’s easy to start doubting ourselves and giving in to our insecurities. But in life, and especially in business, success often hinges on our ability to bounce back from rejection. So how do we not only move forward after a disappointment, but use it as a learning experience to get to the next level? In Episode 4, we talked to someone who puts himself out there on a regular basis: award-winning stand-up comedian and actor Adam Ferrara. You’ll also hear from CENTURY 21 Agent Mike Stengel, who shares his personal experiences dealing with and overcoming rejection in real estate.
Download and listen to The Relentless wherever you listen:
Apple Podcasts 
Stitcher
Overcast
Spotify
TuneIn
Head here to learn more about Adam and this episode of The Relentless.
This paid podcast is produced by Slate Studios and Century 21 Real Estate.
